user.description: Log in to your SMART Tag Parent Portal account

choose_times.title: Choose Routes
choose_times.description:
We've guessed some routes from the past 50 bus rides this student has taken. You can **select the ones you want to add**, and/or **manually add routes below**.

### Fields:
**Embark start:** The time to start polling for the student's embarkation on the bus
**Embark end:** The time to cancel polling if the student did not get on the bus
**Ride length:** The number of minutes to wait after the student embarks before polling for debarkation
**Debark end:** The time to cancel debark polling if for some reason the student does not get off the bus

error.no_students: No students are linked to that account.

abort.already_configured: This student has already been configured
